page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = A5_RUN_NETMAILER_JOB( Job_Name as C, Filter as C, Order as C, Show_UI as L )

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: .T. = Indicates that the job was run successfully. .F. = The job was cancelled or did not run successfully.

argument.name: Job_Name
argument.description: The name of the job in format "Jobname@datadictionary.ddd".

argument.name: Filter
argument.description: An additional filter expression that sub-selects records from the records selected by the netmailer job.

argument.name: Order
argument.description: An additional order expression that reorders records differently from the order expression in the netmailer job.

argument.name: Show_UI
argument.description: Default = .T. Indicates whether to display the user interface. .T. = Display UI .F. = Hide UI

page.discussion: The A5_RUN_NETMAILER_JOB() function runs a Netmailer job, optionally hiding the user interface.

section.description: The following example displays a dialog box that confirms that you want to run the selected Netmailer job.
